title: Mighty.No.9-CODEX
description:
C O D E X
P R E S E N T S

Mighty No. 9 (c) Deep Silver

Release Date: 06/2016 Protection: Steam
Discs: 1 Genre: Action

Mighty No. 9 is a Japanese 2D Side-scrolling Action game that takes
the best elements from 8 and 16-bit classics that you know and love
and transforms them with modern tech, fresh mechanics, and fan
input into something fresh and amazing! You play as Beck, the 9th
in a line of powerful robots, and the only one not infected by a
mysterious computer virus that has caused mechanized creatures the
world over to go berserk

For more info go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/314710/

System Requirements:

OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer 
Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad @ 2.8 GHz or AMD Phenom X4 
Memory: 4 GB RAM 
Graphics: Radeon HD 7770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti 
Storage: 2 GB available space

Extract
Burn or mount the .iso
Run setup.exe and install
Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
Play

Notes:

The game is not that amazing but after long years
Mister Inafumi Keiji tried to bring the mega man
back in video game industry, so after reading the
reviews we decided to throw back the game for our
Pirate fans, last one this will end well, so guys
enjoy and credits to CV1 and the team live back 
the memory of our torrent mania again :smile:

General Notes:

Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online
If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead

CODEX is currently looking for

nothing but competition!

are you ready?

LNK^CPS
02/2015
